segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing; the sink is overflowing, and the woman doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, creating a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of urgency, like I need to warn her before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying a plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children behind her, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried someone is going to slip on the wet floor and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool the boy is standing on looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a disaster about to happen, and no one is doing anything to stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon and sees what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand just watching this; someone needs to do something.
segments.speaker: PAR
